entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character in the story, standing in a dimly lit room and facing a semicircle of wizards. His voice is described as high and cold, indicating his emotional state.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a character in the story, standing above the goblin and speaking to Harry with fury and fear burning inside him. His eyes are described as red.

relationships.description: Harry is facing a semicircle of wizards, including Voldemort, who is speaking to him with fury and fear burning inside him.
